English: one's birth data for astrological purposes, combined from year, month, day, hour, heavenly trunk and earthly branch

d.f: `我國~`星命~`家~`以~`出生~`的~`年分~、`月分~、`日子~、`時辰~，`用~`天干~、`地支~`配合~，`合~`為~`八字~，`故~`稱~`為~「`生辰八字~」，`並~`以此~`作為~`推算~`一生~`命運~`的~`根據~。

English: one's birth data for astrological purposes, combined from year, month, day, hour, heavenly trunk and earthly branch
